Oddly enough, I only see this stacktrace for my runtime workspace, and not in 
the error log for my dev workspace.

Yes.  Interestingly enough, I only see the error message when launching one of 
my runtime workspaces.  But I don't EVER see the splash screen anywhere.  Only 
the progress bar listing the plug-ins being loaded.
Pascal, do you think my patch to Main.java could have caused this?

I don't think the patch could the cause if this problem.
Moreover in my case the splash screen displays properly.
The only that I can think of if, either the image does not exists and the
launcher can't find it or it is corrupted and the it can't be displayed.

Pratik, when you start a runtime workspace, do you start an application (not 
branded) or a product (branded)?

Does d:\Eclipse3.1RC2\eclipse\eclipse exist on your machine?

I have one runtime-workspace launched as application, another as product.  I 
don't see the splash screen with either.  The one that shows the error is the 
one that's launched as a product.

Yes, that directory exists.  It has an empty plugins directory.
This seems to be fixed in 3.1RC3.
Pratik, this this happen again? If not, I could close this PR.
No, I don't encounter this problem anymore.
